name: Simple Destruction
description:
A short tycoon simulation game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Story

You are a monster capable of creating destruction, but it costs money because

 nothing is free. You can collect money by scaring villagers and stealing magically 

earning coins. How fast can you beat the game?

Detailed Controls

Scare villagers, drag around destruction and collect money with left mouse button.

Drag around with right mouse button to move around.

Zoom out by scrolling the middle mouse button.

Credits

Sound effects were from https://mixkit.co/

All other assets were made by me
